partialCompletionMessage: Great effort in completing your prayers today!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah help you pray each one on time, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah accept your salah and bless your day.

completionMessage: You've completed all your prayers today!
partialCompletionMessage: MashaAllah, you made it through all five prayers today.
partialBlessingMessage: Try to catch each one at the right time—it makes a big difference.
blessingMessage: May Allah reward your dedication and grant you peace.

completionMessage: Alhamdulillah, all prayers done for today!
partialCompletionMessage: Completing all five is a big step—well done!
partialBlessingMessage: Aim to pray without delay next time, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah shower His blessings upon your worship.

partialBlessingMessage: Next step: praying each salah on time, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah accept your efforts and guide your heart.

partialCompletionMessage: You completed them all—keep it up!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah help you stay consistent with praying right on time.
blessingMessage: May Allah make your salah a means of closeness to Him.

completionMessage: SubhanAllah, all prayers checked off today!
partialCompletionMessage: That’s a strong finish—well done on praying all five.
partialBlessingMessage: Let’s aim to pray every salah on time next time, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah bless your commitment and strengthen your faith.

partialCompletionMessage: Alhamdulillah for completing your prayers today.
partialBlessingMessage: Praying on time brings more reward—keep striving, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah grant you tranquility through your worship.

completionMessage: You've nailed all your prayers today!
partialCompletionMessage: Great consistency—five prayers is no small achievement.
partialBlessingMessage: Now work on praying right when the time comes, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah accept your devotion and uplift your spirit.

partialBlessingMessage: Try to be even more prompt next time, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah reward your steadfastness with His mercy.

completionMessage: Bravo, all prayers done for the day!
partialCompletionMessage: You made it through every prayer—great effort!
partialBlessingMessage: Catching prayers right on time adds even more barakah, inshaAllah.
blessingMessage: May Allah make your salah a light for your path.
